name: Leather Armor
description: Leather Armor is made from the hides of various animals, such as cows, deer, and even dragons. It is a lightweight and flexible armor that provides decent protection against physical attacks, but is less effective against magical attacks.

name: Studded Leather Armor
description: Studded Leather Armor is made of leather that has been reinforced with small metal studs. It provides a good balance of protection and mobility, making it a popular choice among adventurers.

name: Chain Shirt
description: A Chain Shirt is a type of armor that is made up of interlocking metal rings. It is lighter and more flexible than full plate armor, but still provides a good amount of protection. The rings are usually made of steel, but can also be made of other metals such as bronze or brass.

name: Splint Mail
description: Splint Mail Armor is made up of vertical strips of metal that are riveted to a backing of leather or cloth. The strips are typically made of steel, but can also be made of other metals such as bronze or brass. The strips are arranged in a pattern that provides maximum protection while still allowing for some degree of flexibility and movement.

name: Banded Mail
description: Banded Mail is a type of armor made up of overlapping horizontal strips of metal, which are riveted together and attached to a cloth or leather backing. The strips provide good protection against slashing attacks, but are less effective against piercing attacks.

name: Plate Mail
description: Plate Mail Armor is a heavy armor made up of large metal plates that cover most of the body. The plates are attached to each other with leather straps and metal buckles, forming a rigid and protective shell. The armor is designed to absorb the impact of attacks and deflect blows away from the wearer's body.
